TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IsolatedStorage extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public MustInherit Class IsolatedStorage Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class IsolatedStorage abstract : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 表示所有独立存储实现都必须从中派生的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all isolated storage implementations must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关基于文件的独立存储的信息，请参阅类。For information about file-based isolated storage, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 独立存储不适用于 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 相反，使用 `Windows.Storage` API 中包含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空间中的应用程序数据类来存储本地数据和文件。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows 开发人员中心的 [应用程序数据](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center.

.property instance object ApplicationIdentity
Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationIdentity As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ApplicationIdentity { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于确定独立存储范围的应用程序标识。

span.span: Gets an application identity that scopes isolated storage.
An that represents the identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于应用程序的定义包括与应用程序相关联的所有程序集，你可以使用这种类型的标识以确保仅与应用程序相关联的程序集才有权访问独立存储。Since the definition of an application includes all assemblies associated with the application, you can use this type of identity to ensure that only assemblies associated with the application have access to the isolated storage.

exception.span: 该代码缺少访问此对象所需的 。

span.span: The code lacks the required to access this object.

exception.span: 这些权限由运行时基于安全策略授予。

span.span: These permissions are granted by the runtime based on security policy.

exception.span: 对象没有被应用程序 隔离。

span.span: The object is not isolated by the application .
for the ability to access evidence.

span.span: An operation was performed that requires access to , but that property is not defined for this store.

exception.span: 由于使用了部分证据来打开存储区，因此通过使用枚举所获取的存储没有定义完善的 。

span.span: Stores that are obtained by using enumerations do not have a well-defined property, because partial evidence is used to open the store.

summary.span: 获取表示独立存储当前大小的值。

span.span: Gets a value representing the current size of isolated storage.

value.span: 该独立存储范围内当前使用的存储单元的数目。

span.span: The number of storage units currently used within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示在独立的存储范围内的所有存储资源的总体使用情况。This property represents the total usage of all storage resources within the isolated storage scope. 实现此属性。 implements this property. 情况下对象，此值是以字节为单位。In the case of objects, this value is in bytes. 在其他存储对象，例如数据库、 实现的情况下此值可能在存储其他单元中。In the case of implementations of other storage objects, such as a database, this value might be in other units of storage.

exception.span: 独立存储区的当前大小未定义。

span.span: The current size of the isolated store is undefined.

param.name: ps
param.span: ，它包含授予尝试使用独立存储的代码的权限集。

span.span: The object that contains the set of permissions granted to code attempting to use isolated storage.

summary.span: 当由派生类实现时，从权限集中返回表示对独立存储的访问权限的权限。

span.span: When implemented by a derived class, returns a permission that represents access to isolated storage from within a permission set.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类来确定哪些权限类型控制其使用，并返回类型已被授予的权限调用此方法。You call this method on derived classes to determine what permission type governs their use, and to return the permission of the type that has been granted. 使用此信息来确定允许的配额和派生的类特定的独立的存储的任何其他设置。Use this information to determine the allowable quota and any other derived class-specific isolated storage settings.

.property instance unsigned int64 MaximumSize
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property MaximumSize As ULong
public: virtual property System::UInt64 MaximumSize { System::UInt64 get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值表示独立存储的最大可用空间数量。

span.span: Gets a value representing the maximum amount of space available for isolated storage.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，该值可以采用不同的度量单位。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this value can take different units of measure.

value.span: 独立存储空间的最大数量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum amount of isolated storage space in bytes.

value.span: 派生类可以返回不同单位的值。

span.span: Derived classes can return different units of value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现属性返回的值，其中用字节表示。The default implementation of the property returns the value of , which is expressed in bytes. 派生的类可以表示在度量值的其他单元中的值。Derived classes can express the value in other units of measure. 此类实现的潜在示例是一个独立的存储数据库。A potential example of such an implementation is an isolated storage database. 无法设置，但配额在安全策略配置，并且可进行设置。You cannot set , but the quota is configured in the security policy, and can be set. 代码接收的空间的证据，根据配额，因此如果运行不同的证据，相同的代码会收到不同的配额 （例如，在 intranet 上运行本地和从共享同一个应用程序可以接收不同的配额）。Code receives a quota of space on the basis of its evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence (for example, the same application run locally and from a share on an intranet can receive different quotas). 实现此属性。 implements this property.

span.span: The quota has not been defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存储被隔离的因素 （用户、 程序集、 域和等等） 的组合。Stores are isolated by a combination of factors (user, assembly, domain, and so on).

para.span: 在 Windows 中此分隔符\\。
